langModel

Class MyNaiveLanguageModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • langModel.MyNaiveLanguageModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LanguageModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MyLaplaceLanguageModel

    public class MyNaiveLanguageModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements LanguageModel
    Class MyNaiveLanguageModel: class implementing the interface LanguageModel by creating a naive language model, i.e. a n-gram language model with no smoothing.
    Author:
    N. Hernandez and S. Quiniou (2015)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected NgramCounts ngramCounts
      The NgramCounts corresponding to the language model.
      protected Vocabulary vocabulary
      The vocabulary of the language model.

      • getLMOrder

        public int getLMOrder()
        Description copied from interface: LanguageModel
        Getter of the language model order. In practice it will get the maximal order of the NgramCounts structure.
        Specified by:
        getLMOrder in interface LanguageModel
        Returns:
        the maximal order of the language model.

      • setNgramCounts

        public void setNgramCounts(NgramCounts ngramCounts)
        Description copied from interface: LanguageModel
        Setter associating the current language model to a NgramCounts object. It also scans the set of ngrams of the ngram counts structure and builds a vocabulary with it.
        Specified by:
        setNgramCounts in interface LanguageModel
        Parameters:
        ngramCounts - the NgramCounts object to set.

      • getNgramProb

        public java.lang.Double getNgramProb(java.lang.String ngram)
        Description copied from interface: LanguageModel
        Method computing and returning the probability of the given n-gram, using the NgramCounts structure. An implementation can consider the Laplace backoff smoothing. Another one can compute the log-probability instead of the probability...
        Specified by:
        getNgramProb in interface LanguageModel
        Parameters:
        ngram - the n-gram whose probability to compute.
        Returns:
        the probability of the given n-gram.

      • getSentenceProb

        public java.lang.Double getSentenceProb(java.lang.String sentence)
        Description copied from interface: LanguageModel
        Method computing and returning the probability of the given sentence, according to its n-grams.
        Specified by:
        getSentenceProb in interface LanguageModel
        Parameters:
        sentence - the sentence whose probability to compute.
        Returns:
        the probability of the given sentence.
